mapper.select: select * from tbl_faq order by faq_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_faq(FAQ_CODE, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT) values(seq_faq_code.nextval, #{faq_title}, #{faq_content})
mapper.select: select a.*, n.notice_check from (select * from tbl_board where board_category_code = 'BCC01')a, tbl_notice_check n where a.board_code = n.board_code order by n.notice_check desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(BOARD_CODE, BOARD_CATEGORY_CODE, USER_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) values(seq_board_code.nextval, 'BCC01', 'admin', #{board_title}, #{board_content})
mapper.select: select b.board_code from(select rownum rnum, a.* from (select board_code from tbl_board order by board_date desc) a )b where rnum = 1
select a.*, n.notice_check from (select * from tbl_board where board_category_code = 'BCC01')a, tbl_notice_check n where a.board_code = n.board_code and a.board_code = #{board_code}
